---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: ['enhancement']
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you would like to see implemented.

## Problem Statement

Describe the problem or limitation that this feature would solve. Explain the use case.

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working. Include:

- Expected behavior
- User interface or API changes
- Configuration options if applicable

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you have considered.

## Use Cases

Provide specific examples of how this feature would be used:

1. Use case one
2. Use case two
3. Use case three

## Benefits

Explain the benefits of implementing this feature:

- Who would benefit from this feature?
- How would it improve the project?
- What impact would it have on users?

## Implementation Considerations

If you have thoughts on implementation:

- Technical approach
- Potential challenges
- Breaking changes or backward compatibility concerns
- Dependencies or requirements

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, examples, or references about the feature request here.

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I am willing to submit a pull request to implement this feature
- [ ] I can provide additional specifications or requirements
- [ ] I can help with testing and validation
